Date: Thursday, 6/12/1988
Subject: Progress of Esteban Beltre
Dear Sir,
Esteban Beltre has nothing more to prove at A Cedar Rapids Reds!
He has an AVG of .352 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
